CustomField.description: This field will be populated via backend processing so that when a SSSW Case is assigned to a BOH queue, the Agent Type will automatically be set to BOH. Likewise, when a SSSW Case is assigned to a FOH queue, the Agent Type will automatically be set to FOH.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will be populated via backend processing so that when a SSSW Case is assigned to a BOH queue, the Agent Type will automatically be set to BOH. Likewise, when a SSSW Case is assigned to a FOH queue, the Agent Type will automatically be set to FOH.
CustomField.label: Agent Type
